jobDescription: Fahrenheit 212 is a global innovation, strategy and design firm. We define innovation strategies and develop products, services, and experiences that create sustainable, profitable growth for our clients.  We are looking for an Innovation Director to join the Idea Development team in our New York office. Were looking for someone with the ability to think strategically and creatively, and with experience and passion for developing and expressing new ideas and opportunities. You should be self-propelled by relentless curiosity, resourceful in scouring the world for insight and comfortable in a fast-paced environment. You should have extensive experience generating powerful consumer insights, developing breakthrough innovation solutions and crafting new product concepts for Fortune 500 companies across a range of industries.  We have a team of sixty working out of our office in downtown Manhattan.
